name: Snaze 2
description:
Snaze 2 is a platforming game that uses the Snaze map rendering engine I developed a week ago. It has actual graphics, 5 levels, platforms, lava, and each level has its own little quest. Collect the reddish berries, or find out what happens when you give them to the all the cute creepers!

Made mostly for speedrunning, but can be fun for casual play (warning, some spots are hard!) Everything is possible.
